title: 0-click deanonymization attack targeting Signal, Discord, other platforms

title: Ask HN: Organize local communities without Facebook?
author: recvonline
aiHeadline: The Age-Old Question: How to Organize Local Communities Without Facebook, Because Let's Face It, We're All Tired of Mark Zuckerberg's Shenanigans, and We Need Some Serious Alternatives, Stat! Any Ideas, Folks, or Are We Doomed to Forever Be Held Hostage by the Social Media Giant?

title: Invisible Electrostatic Wall at 3M plant (1996)
author: Simon_O_Rourke
aiHeadline: Blast from the Past: The Invisible Electrostatic Wall at 3M Plant (1996) - Because Who Needs Modern Technology When You Can Have a 30-Year-Old Experiment That's Still Cool, But Also Kind of Creepy, Like Something Out of a Sci-Fi Movie, and We're Not Sure What's More Fascinating, the Tech or the Hairdos in the Old Photos
